name: VirusWatch
description:
You are an antivirus! Keep the MainFrame alive!

Instructions
- Keep the viruses away from the MainFrame from 1AM to 7AM for 5 Nights!
- Viruses have their color codes. You have to use the correct weapon for each virus.
- You will lose if one virus reaches the MainFrame.
- You won't die if you encounter any virus, however they would still attack you causing your vision to get blurry overtime.

(Numpad above the alphabet keys)

1.Blue Virus - Num 1 
2. Orange Virus - Num 2
3. Yellow Virus - Num 3
4. Green Virus - Num 4
5. Red Virus - Num 5
